entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
